ClientWebPart.Name: BrightcovePlaylistWebPart
ClientWebPart.Title: Brightcove Playlist WebPart
ClientWebPart.Description: Brightcove Web Part to embed playlist content onto a web part page.

Property.Name: accountId
Property.WebDisplayName: The id of the account that contains the playlist content

Property.Name: playerId
Property.WebDisplayName: The id of the player to use

Property.Name: modeId
Property.WebDisplayName: The id of the playlist to display

Property.Name: autoplay
Property.WebDisplayName: Indicates if the playlist should autoplay

Property.Name: muted
Property.WebDisplayName: Indicates if the playlist should be muted
